body_html: I don't think we need to review the code just yet, this is more about just getting autogradpp into PyTorch as a base for the API. We can review the code closely as I make PRs that modify autogradpp to match the Python API. @apaszke let me know if this is OK and I'll merge this.
body_text: I don't think we need to review the code just yet, this is more about just getting autogradpp into PyTorch as a base for the API. We can review the code closely as I make PRs that modify autogradpp to match the Python API. @apaszke let me know if this is OK and I'll merge this.
body: I don't think we need to review the code just yet, this is more about just getting autogradpp into PyTorch as a base for the API. We can review the code closely as I make PRs that modify autogradpp to match the Python API. @apaszke let me know if this is OK and I'll merge this.
